item.name: MySQL bytes received per second
item.description:
The number of bytes received from all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL bytes sent per second
item.description:
The number of bytes sent to all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL begin operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL commit operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL delete operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL insert operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL rollback operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL select operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL update operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL queries per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL slow queries
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL uptime
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.extended_status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL status
item.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.ping, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.
0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

item.name: MySQL seconds behind master
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_lagging, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL executed master position
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL replication last error
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL replication last IO error
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL replication last SQL error
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL master host
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL read master position
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL relay log space
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL slave IO running
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL slave SQL running
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.slave_status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL version
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.version, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

trigger.expression: {Template App MySQL with replication:mysql.slave_status[Slave_IO_Running].max(#3)}=0 or {Template App MySQL with replication:mysql.slave_status[Slave_SQL_Running].max(#3)}=0
trigger.name: MySQL slave is not running
MySQL slave is out of sync (more than 3 minutes behind master)
